name: Puzzle Quazzle
description:
FREE YOUR MIND! Easy to play brain puzzle game that improves your concentration. Be the King of unblocked brain skills! From now, enjoy a world of the amazing sensational puzzle mechanics for all ages, even harder than all you played earlier. You can play with your family for education or with your friends in Fridays pub puzzle battles. Even compare your achievements with gamers from all the world! Some people think that Quazzle trains brain better than origami, and thats true!

Game rules:
- Look at the figure and draw it on the field.
- Remove rows.
- Get higher scores.

No rush. Simple, mind challenging classic Blocks Puzzle game!
